resources.string:
Blinkr allows anyone to connect and message drivers around them using only the drivers license plate number.


It acts like a bulletin board for your area by showing the most recent messages from people around you to drivers around you.


Post messages to help drivers, ask questions, or just speak your mind and hopefully make new friends. To post a message, you simply enter the license plate number and you are ready to go.

1. DON’T TEXT AND DRIVE.


2. IF USING BLINKR WHILE IN A VEHICLE, YOU MUST BE A PASSENGER AND NOT THE DRIVER.


3. BE NICE AND BE KIND.


4. DO NOT BULLY OR SPECIFICALLY TARGET ANYONE VIA BLINKR.


5. DO NOT POST PERSONAL IDENTIFYING INFORMATION ON BLINKR.


6. KEEP IT LOCAL.


7. DON’T BE A JERK.


8. DO NOT USE BLINKR TO INSIGHT VIOLENCE AGAINST ANYONE.


9. DO NOT BREAK THE LAW.


10. ENJOY BLINKING.
